name: EscapeVelocity (OrdiNeu)
description:
Brave space explorer, you have ventured too close to a black hole and been pulled in! Each time you enter, you are spit out into another reality! 

Use your wits, luck, and a little bit of boosters to escape the deadly gravitational pull!

Use the orbit of nearby planets and clever resource management to escape certain doom. Dodge asteroids, slingshot off of large astral bodies and soak up some sweet, sweet fuel from radioactive stars. 
Clear the gravitational pull of the black hole to win.

Controls: 

- [a] and [d] or [left] and [right] to rotate 

- [z] or [space] to boost 

Refuel your engine at radioactive planets 

Resources:
- Norma 2D's Celestial Objects Art Pack

Made for Ludum Dare 47. Theme: Stuck in a Loop
